item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:256 Chances: Robinhood’s trading volumes have risen sharply in February, indicating a resurgence of retail investors and potential for increased revenue. The company’s assets under custody have also increased by 16%, showing strong asset growth and potential for continued success. Analysts are optimistic about the company’s prospects, with Bernstein initiating coverage with an Outperform rating and a $30 price target.
